body:
Comment 9: 
I know this is a surprise for people coming from Java or other
languages with an explicit constructor notion.  On the other
hand, though, you can always run 'godoc net Listen' or use your
browser to search for Listen.

Package net is really the worst example to be using here, because
the API is ridiculously large.  There is a separate issue for us to
write a very good package comment before Go 1.
